scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach -p run clean && rm .yarn/yarn.build.json
scripts.dev: yarn build:pkg && yarn workspaces foreach -pvi run dev
scripts.dev:no-cache: yarn build:pkg:no-cache && yarn workspaces foreach -pvi run dev
scripts.start: yarn build:e2e && yarn workspace e2e start
scripts.start:no-cache: yarn build:e2e:no-cache && yarn workspace e2e start
scripts.start:docs: yarn build:docs && yarn workspace docs start
scripts.start:docs:no-cache: yarn build:docs:no-cache && yarn workspace docs start
scripts.clean:pkg: yarn workspaces foreach -p --no-private run clean && rm .yarn/yarn.build.json
